Cream butter and cheese. Add flour and garlic salt. Work dough into ball shape. Cut dough ball in half. Roll dough out on a floured surface. Dough should be the thicknsss of pie pastry. Cut out dough with small biscuit cutter. Squeeze a dab of anchovy paste in the center of each biscuit. Fold over dough into half-moon shape. Freeze immediately.
